items.title: Canaccord downgrades Lithium Americas to sell after Trump takes equity stake
items.description: Lithium Americas rally on the Trump administration equity stake is overdone, according to Canaccord Genuity.

items.title: A health-care stock that's maintaining momentum despite regulatory headwinds
items.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

items.title: JPMorgan doubles the price target for this booming clean energy stock
items.description: Bloom Energy shares have gained about 300% this year as its onsite power generation systems are in high demand from data center customers.

items.title: A buying opportunity has emerged in this agriculture stock, JPMorgan says
items.description: Analyst Jeffrey Zekauskas upgraded Corteva to overweight from neutral, saying the agricultural stock is undervalued after Wednesday's drawdown.
